Headline: #26 South Shore Express, #30 South Chicago Temporary Reroute at Ewing/95th
ShortDescription: #26 South Shore Express & #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Ewing, 95th, Avenue L, 100th and Ewing due to, street blockage near Ewing/95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#26 South Shore Express and #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ewing, 95th, Avenue L, 100th, and Ewing, due to construction near 95th/Ewing.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #111A Pullman Shuttle, #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Northbound Reroute near King Drive/115th
ShortDescription: NB 111A Pullman Shuttle, 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Front, 114th and King Drive: due to, street blockage near King Drive/115th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #111A Pullman Shuttle, 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Front, 114th and King Drive: due to, street blockage near King Drive/115th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #52A South Kedzie Temporary Southbound Reroute near 115th/Spaulding
ShortDescription: Southbound 52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 119th, Pulaski and 115th: due to, street blockage near 115th/Spaulding.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 119th, Pulaski and 115th: due to, street blockage near 115th/Spaulding.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #96 Lunt Temporary Westbound Reroute near Lunt/Greenview
ShortDescription: Westbound 96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Morse, Sheridan, Pratt, Ashland and Lunt: due to, street blockage near Lunt/Greenview.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Morse, Sheridan, Pratt, Ashland and Lunt: due to, street blockage near Lunt/Greenview.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed near Belmont
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing near Belmont due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing near Belmont due to a mechanical problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
